examples.text: Naging apa imaw matapos nana nga madisgrasya tag unga paeang imaw.
examples.translation: He became mute after an accident when he was still a child.

examples.text: Bisan maeagko eon imaw hay naga inapa gihapon.
examples.translation: He pretends to be mute even when he is old enough to speak.

examples.text: Gina paagi nana sa pagsueat anang nahambae bangod imaw hay apa.
examples.translation: He communicates through writing because he is mute.

examples.text: Indi imaw pwede kaguwa it baeay bangod sa anang baeatian.
examples.translation: He cannot go out of the house because of his sickness.

definitions.definition: Inability to see due to a physical condition or state of mind.

examples.text: Bisan imaw hay bulag, owa naging baeabag kana ra agod imaw hay mag-eskuyla.
examples.translation: Being blind did not hinder him to pursue his education.

examples.text: Bulag imaw sa kamatuuran bangod puro fake news ra gina binasa.
examples.translation: He is blind to the truth because he only reads fake news.

examples.text: Cataracts sa daywa ka mata ro rason haman imaw hay bulag.
examples.translation: He is blind in both eyes because of cataracts.

examples.text: "Bulagon ka gid it imong pagpinueaw sa cellphone ngaron," prime kakon nga hambae ni nanay.
examples.translation: "One of these days, sleeping late with your phone will make you blind," mother always said to me.

examples.text: Gingbulag imaw it diretsohang pagtan-aw sa solar eclipse.
examples.translation: He got blinded by directly looking at the solar eclipse.

examples.text: Tama gidman hambae ko anang nanay hay nabulag imaw sa pagpinueaw sa cellphone.
examples.translation: What his mother told him was true because he got blind by always sleeping late with his phone.

examples.text: Hambae it doktor hay indi ka man mabulag sa pagmantaw it maeapit sa t.v..
examples.translation: The doctor said that watching close to your t.v. will not make you blind.

examples.text: Nag enroll imaw sa eskuylahan nga para sa mga bulag.
examples.translation: He enrolled in the school for the blind.

definitions.definition: Inability to hear either patially or completely.

examples.text: Nabaskugan nana mag-istorya sa anang Nanay bangod sa bungoe eon ra pihak nga dueunggan sa kagueangon.
examples.translation: He speaks loudly since his Mother's other ear has become deaf due to old age.

examples.text: Nabungoe imaw bangod sa tubi nga nag sueod sa anang dueunnggan pagligos na sa baybay.
examples.translation: He became deaf because water got stuck in his ears after he swam on the beach.

examples.text: Nag pabungoe imaw sa sugo it anang Nanay nga magbakae it andang ilabas sa tindahan.
examples.translation: He was deaf to his Mother's commands to buy their lunch in the market.

examples.text: Nagagamit it sign language do mga bungoe agod maka istorya.
examples.translation: Deaf people use sign language to communicate.

definitions.definition: Closing and opening one eye quickly as a signal or reflex.

examples.text: Ga insayo it morse code ro magbarkada gamit ro kindat it andang mga mata.
examples.translation: They are practicing morse code through winking.

examples.text: "Kindati ing nailaan pag makita mo imaw," hambae kakon sang amigo.
examples.translation: "Wink at your crush when you see her later," said my friend.

examples.text: Ging kindatan ko imaw tag nag sub-eang among mga mata.
examples.translation: I winked at her the moment our eyes met.

definitions.definition: Having good health or free of any sickness.

examples.text: Pasaeamat ro mag-asawa nga matimsog ro andang bag-ong unga.
examples.translation: The couple was thankful because their baby was born healthy.

definitions.definition: A shaft with feathers or vanes at the rear and a sharpened point at the front that is fired from a bow.

examples.text: Mataeom ro pana nga ging gamit it mga gapangayam sa pagdakop it pispis.
examples.translation: The arrow that the hunters used to catch the bird was very sharp.
